name: GreyCat Aviation
about: GreyCat Aviation, located in Chesapeake, Virginia, offers a comprehensive and personalized flight training experience. Led by Rob Garcia, a Gold Seal CFI, CFII, and MEI, the school provides individualized instruction from Sport Pilot to ATP certifications. Students can benefit from tailwheel training and a variety of flight programs tailored to their needs. With a focus on high-quality training, GreyCat Aviation ensures that each pilot receives the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the ever-evolving world of aviation. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced pilot, GreyCat Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Sport Pilot
Instrument
Multi-Engine"]
